skill.name: Unlocking the Ghost
skill.normal: Unlocks the ability to place an ecm.

skill.name: Dead Presidents
skill.normal: Adds 10% more value to loose items that you pick up.
skill.ace: Adds an additional 20% more value to loose items that you pick up.

skill.name: Sprinter
skill.normal: The time before stamina regeneration starts is reduced by 25% and the regeneration of stamina is increased by 25%.
skill.ace: Your sprint speed is increased by 25% and you have a 25% better chance dodging enemy fire while sprinting.

skill.name: Cat Burglar
skill.normal: You take 75% less damage from falling from non-fatal heights.
skill.ace: Your fall damage is reduced so that you only take armor damage from falling from non-fatal heights. Your custody time is reduced by 50%.

skill.name: Fast Hands
skill.normal: You can pack and interact with loot bags 25% faster.
skill.ace: Further increases your pack and interaction speed with loot bags by 50%. (Stacks with Basic skill for 75% total).

skill.name: Chameleon
skill.normal: In casing mode, you can now mark guards, cameras and your concealment is increased by 25%.
skill.ace: You are 15% less likely to be targeted when you are close to your crew members.

skill.name: Cleaner
skill.normal: You deal 5% more damage against special enemies. You can now buy a body bag asset which contains 3 body bags that can be shared with your crew.
skill.ace: 1 additional body bag is added to your inventory.

skill.name: Shinobi
skill.normal: Your walk speed is increased by 25% and your crouch speed is increased by 10%.
skill.ace: Enemies make 95% less noise when shot or meleed to death. (Reduces the sound radius to 0.25 meters).

skill.name: Martial Arts
skill.normal: You are 50% more likely to knock down an enemy with a melee strike.
skill.ace: You take 50% less damage from all melee attacks because of training.

skill.name: SMG Specialist
skill.normal: Increases your reload speed of SMG weapons by 35%.
skill.ace: Increases your rate of fire with SMGs by 20%.

skill.name: Nine Lives
skill.normal: You gain the ability to go into bleedout 1 more time before going into custody.
skill.ace: When you get into bleedout, you have a 35% chance to get right back up.

skill.name: ECM Specialist
skill.normal: You can now place 2 ECM jammers instead of just one.
skill.ace: The ECM jammer duration is increased by 25% and the ECM feedback duration lasts 25% longer. The ECM jammer now delays the pager response time as long as the jammer is active.

skill.name: Silent Killer
skill.normal: You deal 15% more damage with all silenced weapons.
skill.ace: You deal 15% more damage and have a 20% chance to pierce enemy armor with silenced weapons. (Stacks with Basic skill for 30% total more damage with silenced weapons).

skill.name: Lockpicking Expert
skill.normal: Increases your lockpicking interaction speed by 25%.
skill.ace: You can now silently crack safes by hand. Further increases your lockpicking interaction speed by 25%. (Stacks with Basic skill for 50% total increase in lockpick interaction speed).

skill.name: ECM Overdrive
skill.normal: Your ECM jammer duration is increased by 25%.
skill.ace: Your ECM jammer can now also be used to open certain doors.

skill.name: The Professional
skill.normal: Your weapon stability with silenced weapons is increased by 50%. Your snap to zoom is 100% faster with silenced weapons. (Reduced recoil for all silenced weapons by 50%).
skill.ace: Your weapon accuracy with silenced weapons is increased by 50%. You gain a 20% chance to pierce enemy armor with silenced weapons.

skill.name: Camera Loop
skill.normal: Interacting with a camera at close range will cause the camera to temporarily see a pre-recording for the next 10 seconds so you can sneak past it. Your crew can only loop 1 camera at a time.
skill.ace: Camera loop duration is increased by 10 seconds. (Stacks with Basic skill for 20 seconds total).

skill.name: ECM Feedback
skill.normal: You can now interact with ECM jammers to cause a feedback loop. When interacted, the ECM jammer has a 50%-100% chance to incapacitate enemies within a 25 meters radius every 1.5 seconds. ECM feedback lasts 15-20 seconds.
skill.ace: You will now instantly interact with a ECM jammer and the ECM feedback duration is increased by 25%. Your ECM jammer has a 100% chance every 4 minutes to recharge itself.

skill.name: Moving Target
skill.normal: You can now sprint while strafing.
skill.ace: You can now sprint in any direction.
